articles.author: Brett Pulley
articles.title: PepsiCo Forecast Disappoints as North America Volumes Drop - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: (Bloomberg) -- PepsiCo Inc. gave a full-year sales forecast that fell short of analysts’ estimates and reported a drop in volumes in the North America...
articles.content:
(Bloomberg) -- PepsiCo Inc. gave a full-year sales forecast that fell short of analysts estimates and reported a drop in volumes in the North America beverage and Quaker foods units.
